channel.title: Comments on: Attributes of an IT Department
channel.description: A Technical Community for IT Professionals

item.title: By: SQLDenis
item.dc:creator: SQLDenis
item.content:encoded:
I would bet that a big number of companies do

Option: Technology Improvement Only

That way you just have to train the users to use the system correctly

item.title: By: Eli Weinstock-Herman (tarwn)
item.dc:creator: Eli Weinstock-Herman (tarwn)
item.description: There's only 3 Chris...I just talked about them in greater depth than you were expecting.
item.content:encoded: There’s only 3 Chris…I just talked about them in greater depth than you were expecting.

item.title: By: Christiaan Baes (chrissie1)
item.dc:creator: Christiaan Baes (chrissie1)
item.content:encoded:
>>a short series of attributes

short being relative.
